Log:
------------------------- Release 1.3.1.0 --------------------- +++++++++++++++++ MAJOR UPDATE! Canon DSLR Support! +++++++++++
+ Canon DSLR cameras support (currently testing, but works quite good) + DSLR Iso\Shutter\Aperture\WhiteBalance control from app + Canon DSLR movie recording (also with chromakey function) + Canon DSLR photo capture (also with chromakey function) + Canon DSLR chromakey LiveView on photo & video + Separate chromakey settings for photo & video + Improved app stability + Fixed some freaky bugs ;)
